description: Surveys the Snowy Mountains Scheme - largest engineering project ever undertaken in Australia at the time. Outlines the plan for diverting the waters of the Snowy to the Murray. Shows the Guthega Dam and power station; construction in the Guthega Munyang tunnel; the plan for the [new] Adaminaby Dam and early stages of its construction.
